verses.roman:
lakṣa koṭi loka āise, nāhika gaṇana
saṅkīrṇa-sthāne prabhura nā pāya daraśana

synonyms: lakṣa koṭi—hundreds and thousands; loka—people; āise—come; nāhika gaṇana—there was no counting; saṅkīrṇa-sthāne—in a small place; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā pāya daraśana—could not get an audience.
translation: Hundreds and thousands of people came to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. There was no counting the number. Because the Lord's residence was very small, not everyone could see Him.
